domain_tab_DNS_modification_DNS_used: You are currently using the following DNS:
domain_tab_DNS_modification_option_defau: This is the simplest and most reliable solution, with the added benefit of OVHcloud support in case of issues when modifying your records on the DNS zone.
domain_tab_DNS_modification_option_exter: You can autonomously configure and manage your DNS records. Please note that changes to your DNS records cannot be made via the OVHcloud Control Panel.
domain_tab_DNS_modification_option_mixed: Use OVHcloud DNS and my own DNS

This solution ensures enhanced security while improving resilience and availability. Be careful, managing two DNS systems can be complex and in case of issues on the zone, it may be difficult to determine the exact source.
domain_tab_DNS_modification_warning_mess: Warning: you are about to modify the configuration of your DNS servers.
This operation can directly impact the performance, security, and management of your domain name, depending on your specific needs.
In addition, incorrect configuration of your DNS servers can lead to service interruptions. If you have any queries or need any help, please refer to our guides.
domain_tab_DNS_modification_default_acti: Before using OVHcloud’s default DNS, you need to first activate a DNS zone.
domain_tab_DNS_modification_mixed_activa: To use a mixed configuration that includes OVHcloud DNS, you need to first activate a DNS zone.
domain_tab_general_information_banner_ex: Your domain name is suspended. You can still renew it during the grace period. After this period, additional costs will apply, which may vary depending on the extension concerned.
domain_tab_general_information_banner_re: Your domain name is in the process of being deleted, you can still restore it for an additional fee, via the restore link. Otherwise, your domain name will be permanently deleted.
domain_tab_general_information_banner_di: There is an ongoing procedure concerning your domain name. Some features may be affected. Please contact our support team for more information.
domain_tab_general_information_banner_te: Your domain name is undergoing a contact data verification process. Please check the ongoing operations to determine if any action is required on your part.
domain_tab_general_information_banner_ab: We suspect your domain name is being used for fraudulent activities. Some features may be affected. Please check your emails for more information.
domain_tab_general_information_banner_te: Your domain name is suspended as part of a contact data verification process. Please check the ongoing operations to determine if any action is required on your part.
domain_tab_general_information_banner_fo: Your domain name is subject to unilateral cancellation due to non-compliance with the contractual obligation to keep your contact information up to date.
Your domain name is subject to unilateral cancellation due to non-compliance with our special terms and conditions of use.
Your domain name is subject to unilateral cancellation further to a request from a competent authority.
Your domain name is subject to unilateral cancellation by the registry due to non-compliance with its general terms and conditions of use.
domain_tab_general_information_banner_ma: Make managing your infrastructure easier and set up automatic renewal for your domain name. This will prevent any recalls and risk of unintentional deletion.
domain_tab_general_information_tooltip_d: Depending on the lifecycle (registration, renewal, transfer, etc
domain_tab_general_information_subscript: Configure the renewal schedule and your domain will renew automatically, helping you avoid any service disruptions.
This domain name is designated as ‘premium’ by the registry, reflecting its market value, rarity, or general appeal. The actual prices may differ from what is shown on our website.
This is a premium domain name.

domain_tab_contact_management_tile_subti: On this page, you’ll find three contact types (administrative, technical, and billing), each with its own access levels.
domain_tab_contact_management_configurat: You can set the holder for each domain name you add to your cart. You can either edit the contact or reassign a new one for administrative, technical and billing purposes.
domain_tab_contact_management_holder_des: The natural or legal person in whose name the domain name is registered. They are responsible for its use, as well as for keeping record data up to date. The holder can follow a process to become an administrator.
domain_tab_contact_management_admin_desc: They manage the legal and administrative aspects of a domain. They have permissions to modify all contacts. They can manage contractual aspects related to the domain name, such as its renewal or cancellation.
domain_tab_contact_management_tech_descr: They manage the technical aspects of a service. They are responsible for defining authoritative DNS servers.
domain_tab_contact_management_billing_de: They manage a service’s billing and direct debits.
domain_tab_contact_management_holder_pla: To view the registrant contact information, please log in with the administrator account.
domain_table_modal_renew_restore_title: Renew or restore my domain names ({{count}})
domain_table_modal_renew_restore_descrip: To renew or restore your domain names, you must use the OVHcloud renewal interface (outside of the Web Client area)
domain_table_modal_renew_restore_order: Click the button below to access the OVHcloud renewal interface. A new tab will open to redirect you to the OVHcloud renewal interface.
domain_table_modal_renew_restore_message: Please note that a delay of about 2 hours from the acceptance of your payment is required for the renewal to take effect on your domain name.

You will need to make changes in your DNS zone when your new site is ready. This is an ideal choice if you do not want to take down a site that is already in production.

Your domain name will soon be protected from theft.
Your domain name is protected from theft.
Your domain name will soon no longer be protected from theft.

AUTH/INFO
Outgoing transfer tag
The transfer tag has been successfully updated.
Please enter a valid transfer tag.
Please enter the outgoing transfer tag for {{serviceName}}
Enable transfer protection for your domain name
Disable transfer protection for your domain name
Would you like to enable transfer protection for your domain name <Domain />?
Would you like to disable transfer protection for your domain name <Domain />?
AUTH/INFO code
When protection is disabled, you will have access to the AUTH/INFO code allowing the transfer of the domain name by clicking the corresponding button

The authorisation code (AUTH/INFO code) is a code generated by the registrar (or, in some specific cases, by the registry) to authenticate the holder of a domain name. It is mandatory to transfer a domain name to another registrar. For your information, it is also called Auth-Info Code, authorisation code or transfer code.
Transferring your domain name to another registrar will result in the immediate deletion of your DNS zone as well as all its entries: your website and emails may therefore become inaccessible.
The AUTH/INFO code is not managed by OVHcloud, please contact the registry to claim it.
The registry for this domain name does not support the AUTH/INFO code. Please consult our help centre for information on domain name transfer alternatives.
